title: Audioshield
notes: HTC Vive. Ran, but crashes when opening Steam overlay (which you WILL end up doing because the game volume is so loud!)

This game boots out of the box. It has several issues:
* There is a slight noticeable amount of audio latency. This is something which is relatively important since this is a rhythm game. Additionally
* Any interaction with the Steam overlay while this game is running will cause it to freeze.
* After completing a song, the game freezes

It is possible to play this game relatively comfortably for 1 song but then it needs to be restarted.
title: Audioshield
